thread.title: RUMOURS: Man Utd to recall Borthwick-Jackson
thread.title_full: RUMOURS: Man Utd to recall Borthwick-Jackson

title: RUMOURS: Man Utd to recall Borthwick-Jackson
text:
0 Jan 10, 2017 7:37:41 PM The teenage left-back has made just seven appearances for Championship side Wolves and will be recalled by the Red Devils to train in their first-team 
Manchester United are ready to cut short Cameron Borthwick-Jackson's loan spell at Championship side Wolves, according to the Daily Star. 
The 19-year-old joined the second tier side on a season-long loan in the summer but has failed to claim a place in Paul Lambert's side and has not featured since November. 
As a result, Jose Mourinho will recall the left-back to Old Trafford and include him in first-team training where he will compete with Luke Shaw, Daley Blind and Matteo Darmian for a spot on the left side of the Portuguese's defence.
